## mergeObj variable

Merges all given objects in left-to-right order into `dest`<!-- -->. Returns `dest`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mergeObj: <T>(dest: IObjectOf<T>, ...xs: IObjectOf<T>[]) => IObjectOf<T>
```
